headline: The Off-Cycle Opportunity: Buying Builders FirstSource When Others Fear
summary: Builders FirstSource is set to benefit from rate cuts, strong buybacks, and long-term housing trends despite short-term risks. Find out why BLDR stock is a strong buy.
